name: 光電子學
comment: ※授課地點: 應用科學大樓 B1演講廳
description: 本課程旨在介紹半導體光電元件包括介電質波導、半導體雷射、發光二極體、光偵測器、以及太陽能和光伏電池
goals: 了解半導體光電元件的物理、工作原理及應用
syllabus:
1\. Logistics, Overview of the course, Review of quantum mechanics (QM)

2\. Review of QM (cont’d), semiconductor electronics, and electromagnetics (EM)

3\. Fresnel equation, 2×2 matrix approach

4\. Bragg reflector, Guided modes

5\. Mode classification, Cutoff condition

6\. Antiguides, Leaky modes, Resonant optical waveguide (ROW) structure

7\. Periodic dielectric structure (Bloch function analysis)

8\. Photonic bandgap, Bragg reflector bands

9\. Coupled-wave analysis

10\. Coupled-wave analysis (cont’d), Directional coupler, Index grating

11\. Semiconductor lasers-I (Basics)

12\. Semiconductor lasers-II (QW lasers)

13\. Semiconductor lasers-III (DFB lasers, VCSELs)

14\. Light-emitting diodes-I

15\. Light-emitting diodes-II

16\. Photodetectors

17\. Solar cells, Photovoltaics

grading.note: Students should be familiar with software packages like MATLAB, or Python, which are to be used in the homework problems.
